metadata.title: CVE-2021-28964 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was discovered in get_old_root in fs/btrfs/ctree.c in theLinux kernel through 5.11.8. It allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (BUG) because of a lack of locking on an extent buffer before acloning operation, aka CID-dbcc7d57bffc.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
